thing-type.label: DSC19 Micro Smart Energy Illuminator G2

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Make Micro Smart Dimmer 2nd Edition Blink
parameter.description: This is a double byte value. The LSB defines the total time the device need to blink. The value if set in seconds. The MSB defines the on/off interval of the blinking. The unit is 0.1 s.

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Current Overload Protection
parameter.description: Load will be closed when current more that 2.7A and time more than 2 minutes

parameter.name: config_80_1
parameter.label: 80: Notification on Status Change
parameter.description: Parameter to Enable to send notification to associated devices (Group 1) when the state of Micro Smart Dimmer's load changed

parameter.name: config_90_1
parameter.label: 90: Automated sending of a Report triggered by minimal change of value.
parameter.description: Parameter to Enable/Disable automated sending of a Report triggered by minimal change of value.

parameter.name: config_91_2
parameter.label: 91: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
parameter.description: The value represents the minimum change in Wattage for a Report to be sent.

parameter.name: config_92_1
parameter.label: 92: Minimum Change to send Report (%)
parameter.description: The value represents the minimum change in Watage Percent for a report to be sent.

parameter.name: config_101_4
parameter.label: 101: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 1
parameter.description: The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters. The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1.

parameter.name: config_102_4
parameter.label: 102: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 2
parameter.description: The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters. The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1.

parameter.name: config_103_4
parameter.label: 103: Which reports need to send automatically in timing intervals for group 3
parameter.description: The value is a combination number made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters. The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1.

parameter.name: config_111_4
parameter.label: 111: Interval to send out reports of group 1

parameter.name: config_112_4
parameter.label: 112: Interval to send out reports of group 2

parameter.name: config_113_4
parameter.label: 113: Interval to send out reports of group 3

parameter.name: config_120_1
parameter.label: 120: Turn External Button Mode
parameter.description: Parameter to set External button type
